posts.post_content:
I’ve amassed several EPDGs over the last year which I am making available for trade or sale. As you can tell, most of these are in rough shape and/or trimmed but some are pretty tough.

Looking for EPDGs I need or even upgrades to ones I already have.  But will also entertain offers.  

Shoot me a PM with what you have.

Thanks
Jeff 


BERGER, GANLEY, GRAHAM, GRAHAM, KRUGER, OBERLIN, TURNER are sold
